pkgsrcCon 2015 Berlin

May 17, 2015 by Youri Mouton, tags: pkgsrc

pkgsrcCon is taking place in Berlin this year on july 4th and 5th, see the pkgsrcCon 2015 web page about it.

I hope to see many pkgsrc enthusiasts there this year !
